item.title: 新加坡房屋销售再掀狂潮，创九个月新高
item.description: 8 月份，新加坡新房销售量创下 9 个月以来的新高，这凸显了近期随着大量项目投放市场，市场需求再度回升。【原文：Singapore new home sales rose to their highest in nine months in August, underscoring a recent resurgence in demand as a slew of projects hit the market.】

item.title: 土耳其法院的一起重要案件将如何影响市场？
item.description: 土耳其的政治对峙可能在周一达到高潮，届时法院的一项裁决将威胁到主要反对党的生存以及这个拥有 8500 万人口国家的民主未来。【原文：A political standoff in Turkey may reach a climax on Monday, when a court ruling threatens the existence of the main opposition party — and the future of democracy in the country of 85 million people.】

item.title: 在美联储会议之前，铝制头盔创下一年内最长连胜纪录
item.description: 在本周美联储会议可能导致降息之前，铝连续第七个交易日攀升。【原文：Aluminum climbed for a seventh session ahead of this week’s Federal Reserve meeting, which could lead to an interest-rate cut.】

item.description:

item.title: 中国经济活动受挫令铁矿石前景黯淡
item.description: 由于中国 8 月份经济活动的放缓幅度超过预期，给需求前景蒙上阴影，铁矿石收窄了早些时候的跌幅并企稳。【原文：Iron ore pared earlier losses and steadied as China’s economic activity slowed more than expected in August, clouding the demand outlook.】

item.title: 英国央行的 Gilts 决定有可能给里夫斯带来 40 亿英镑的损失
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，如果英格兰银行在本周的一项关键决定中决定停止积极出售金边债券，那么她将需要再筹集 40 亿英镑（54 亿美元）的资金，以使预算重回正轨。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will need to find a further £4 billion ($5.4 billion) to put her budget back on track if the Bank of England decides to stop active gilt sales at a critical decision this week.】

item.title: 惠誉下调评级后法国债券期货走软
item.description: 法国 10 年期国债期货周一走低，交易商对惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）在近期政治动荡后下调法国国债评级做出了反应。【原文：French 10-year bond futures drifted lower on Monday as traders reacted to Fitch Ratings’ downgrade of the country following recent political turmoil.】

item.title: 亚洲股市继续反弹，收盘价创历史新高
item.description: 受美国关税不确定性缓解、中国股市强劲反弹以及对美联储最早可能在下周降息的乐观预期推动，亚洲股市延续涨势，收盘价创下历史新高。【原文：Asia’s equity benchmark headed for a record close, extending a rally fueled by easing uncertainties around US tariffs, a strong rebound in Chinese shares and optimism that the Federal Reserve may cut rates as early as next week.】

item.title: 精品投资银行 BDA 因并购困境裁减中国员工
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，BDA Partners 已裁减了上海的一些投资银行家，以应对中国日益激烈的竞争和交易的不确定性，这是最新一家从世界第二大经济体撤退的金融服务公司。【原文：BDA Partners has cut some investment bankers in Shanghai to cope with intensifying competition in China and uncertainty over deals, people familiar with the matter said, marking the latest financial services firm to retreat from the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 私有化要约提高后盛京银行股价飙升
item.description: 周一，中国地区性银行盛京银行股份有限公司（Shengjing Bank Co.【原文：Shares of Chinese regional lender Shengjing Bank Co. surged as much as 23% in Hong Kong trading on Monday, after its state-backed shareholder said it will raise an offer to take the bank private.】

item.title: 生产控制后中国煤炭和钢铁产量下降
item.description: 由于政府加强了对生产的控制，8 月份中国的煤炭和钢铁产量有所下降。【原文：China churned out less coal and steel in August as the government tightened controls on production.】

item.title: 李泽楷的一汽大众计划通过新债回购 9 亿美元债券
item.description: 香港亿万富翁李泽楷旗下的富登集团控股有限公司（FWD Group Holdings Ltd.）提出用计划中的新债务回购现有美元债券，因为该保险公司正寻求改善其资本结构并降低借贷成本。【原文：Hong Kong billionaire Richard Li’s FWD Group Holdings Ltd. has offered to buy back an existing dollar bond with planned new debt, as the insurer seeks to improve its capital structure and cut borrowing costs.】

item.title: 中国芯片股在针对美国半导体的调查后大涨
item.description: 在中国对某些美国制造的半导体发起反倾销调查后，中国芯片股大涨，提振了国内产业的预期。【原文：Chinese chip stocks surged after the country launched an anti-dumping investigation targeting certain US-made semiconductors, boosting expectations for the domestic industry.】

item.title: 摩根大通下调评级后，Pop Mart 股价创四月以来最大跌幅
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Shares of toymaker Pop Mart International Group Ltd. slumped the most since April on Monday after JPMorgan Chase & Co. downgraded the stock to neutral, citing a lack of catalysts and an unattractive valuation.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Arrowpoint 三月前寻求 4 亿美元新资金
item.description: Arrowpoint Investment Partners 的目标是在第一季度之前筹集多达 4 亿美元的新资金，因为这家多策略对冲基金公司将扩大投资团队的数量。【原文：Arrowpoint Investment Partners aims to raise as much as $400 million of fresh capital by the first quarter, as the multistrategy hedge fund firm expands the number of investment teams, said a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 受摩根大通评级和中国储能计划影响，CATL 股价大涨
item.description: 本周一，安培瑞斯科技公司（Amperex Technology Co.【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.’s shares surged on Monday thanks to a prominent analyst upgrade and expectations for stronger demand outlook for its energy storage system business.】

item.title: 马来西亚要求谷歌帮助调查勒索威胁
item.description: 据Bernama报道，马来西亚将寻求Alphabet公司旗下谷歌的协助，以调查针对一些官员和立法者的性视频威胁。【原文：Malaysia will seek assistance from Alphabet Inc.’s Google to investigate sex video threats targeting some officials and lawmakers, Bernama reported.】

item.title: 投资下滑，中国经济再遭挫折
item.description: 中国经济活动连续第二个月出现超预期放缓，投资大幅下滑，这增加了政策制定者推出更多刺激措施以确保经济增长如期实现官方目标的可能性。【原文：China’s economic activity slowed more than expected for a second straight month with a sharp slump in investment, adding to the likelihood that policymakers will roll out more stimulus to ensure growth stays on track to hit the official target.】

item.title: 菲律宾股票对亚洲同类股票的贴水幅度为 16 年来最大
item.description: 由于特朗普政府不断变化的关税政策加剧了人们对依赖出口的菲律宾经济的担忧，菲律宾股市与该地区同类股市相比出现了自2009年以来最大的折价。【原文：Philippine stocks are trading at their steepest discount to regional peers since 2009, as the Trump administration’s shifting tariff policies add to concerns over the export-reliant economy.】

item.title: 联合拖拉机公司通过收购黄金矿商寻求扩张
item.description: 据一份文件显示，印度尼西亚重型机械经销商 PT United Tractors 寻求通过收购一家金矿开采商来拓展业务。【原文：Indonesian heavy machinery distributor PT United Tractors seeks to expand its businesses by acquiring a gold miner, according to a filing.】

item.title: 中国二手房价格下降更快，一线城市支持力度加大
item.description: 8 月份，中国现房价格加速下跌，凸显了近期各大城市为重振陷入困境的房地产市场而推出的宽松措施的紧迫性。【原文：China’s existing home prices declined at an accelerated pace in August, highlighting the urgency behind recent easing measures introduced by major cities to revive the struggling property market.】

item.title: 货币反弹后宏观基金加大对澳元的期权押注
item.description: 交易员称，宏观对冲基金加大了对澳元的押注，增加了对期权的风险敞口，如果澳元兑主要同类货币继续攀升，期权就会产生回报。【原文：Macro hedge funds have increased bets on the Australian dollar, boosting exposure to options that pay off if the currency continues climbing against major peers, traders say.】

item.title: 洪水加剧美元短缺，巴基斯坦卢比反弹面临风险
item.description: 据外汇交易商称，巴基斯坦致命的洪灾加剧了该国的美元短缺，加剧了人们对囤积美元的担忧，这可能是卢比近期上涨的一个风险。【原文：Pakistan’s deadly floods have exacerbated dollar shortage in the country, intensifying concerns over hoarding of the greenback, according to foreign exchange dealers, in what may be a risk for the rupee’s recent rise.】

item.title: 腾讯为四年来首次债券发行指定银行
item.description: 中国科技和移动游戏巨头腾讯控股有限公司已为其四年来的首次债券发行指定了银行。【原文：Chinese technology and mobile gaming giant Tencent Holdings Ltd. has appointed banks for its first bond offering in four years.】

item.title: 美联储有望降息，黄金交易接近历史高点
item.description: 由于交易商为本周美国联邦储备委员会货币政策的预期宽松做准备，并寻找今年进一步降息的线索，黄金保持在创纪录附近。【原文：Gold held near a record as traders geared up for an anticipated easing of the US Federal Reserve’s monetary policy this week and looked for clues on further rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 比亚迪 450 亿美元股价全军覆没引发对中国前景的疑虑
item.description: 比亚迪公司（BYD Co.）在经历了 450 亿美元的股票抛售后，面临着恢复投资者信心的压力，人们越来越担心该公司在中国破坏性的价格战中抵御竞争的能力。【原文：BYD Co. faces pressure to restore investor confidence after a $45 billion stock selloff, with growing concerns over its ability to fend off competition amid a destructive price war in China.】

item.title: 特朗普期待美联储本周 "大幅减息
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预测，在美联储本周召开关键会议之前，美联储将进行 "大幅减产"，届时央行行长们预计将在九个月内首次放宽政策。【原文：President Donald Trump predicted a “big cut” from the Federal Reserve this week ahead of a pivotal meeting at which the central bank’s governors are expected to ease policy for the first time in nine months.】

item.title: 新西兰服务业疲软暗示经济反弹放缓
item.description: 8 月份，新西兰服务业连续第 18 个月萎缩，这表明第三季度的经济反弹可能会比预期的更加缓慢。【原文：New Zealand’s services industry contracted for an 18th straight month in August, suggesting that an economic rebound in the third quarter could be more sluggish than expected.】

item.title: 关注俄罗斯贸易和迫在眉睫的供应过剩，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 石油价格在上周上涨后变化不大，因为交易商在权衡打击俄罗斯石油流动的举措和今年晚些时候石油过剩的预测。【原文：Oil was little changed after advancing last week, as traders weighed moves to crack down on Russian flows against forecasts for a surplus later in the year.】
